sentences.sContent: Lead in the quality related industrialization process and assure product and process quality / quantity of supplied parts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lead in the quality related industrialization process and assure product and process quality / quantity of supplied parts.
sentences.sCn: 领导的质量相关的工业化进程，确保供应商零部件产品和流程的质量/数量。

sentences.sContent: The basic goal of the reformists is the same: to realize the industrialization of economy and the democratization of politics.
sentences.sContent_eng: The basic goal of the reformists is the same: to realize the industrialization of economy and the democratization of politics.
sentences.sCn: 从整体上看，改良思想家的基本目标是一致的，即：实现经济工业化和政治民主化。

sentences.sContent: Urbanization, although seeming to be an irreversible result of population growth, is caused by both gentrification and industrialization in fact.
sentences.sContent_eng: Urbanization, although seeming to be an irreversible result of population growth, is caused by both gentrification and industrialization in fact.
sentences.sCn: 城市化现象，虽然看起来是人口增长的必然结果，事实上是由士绅化与工业化所造成的。 。

words.tran: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
实业家；工业家；产业工人
产业主义，工业主义；工业制度
使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: when a country or place develops a lot of industry
